attributes.action: Give parents 2 weeks annual leave to take children on holiday during term time
attributes.additional_details: Its unfair for parents to have to pay twice the amount for family holidays. And for children to miss out on exploring the world because its unaffordable during half terms/summer holidays
attributes.background: Put an end to extortionate holiday prices for parents during half term

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
